Posts.Title: not sure what to now firemommy08 firemommy08

Posts.Content: Bonita69 wrote: I was just diagnosed 1-13-09 seems that I was just numb sorta like a dream did not seem real at first...as this week has come...I'm thinking of my surgery, thinking of my life ahead. What scares me is that my mind keeps thinking of the cancer masses....Now that i know it kinda creeps me out....what is that thing doing inside of me, is growing is it invading,going other places in my body....is it going end my life early....all of these thing creep in my mind time to time...still....I have a outstanding support team...My Church, my family,my friends...how does one keep these thoughts out of your head. I'm scared....You see my children lost their daddy my first husband when they where 9 and 11 now at 15 and 17 their mom has cancer...my fear of them losing me... the reality of it....THE BIG C this all creeps in my mind...trying to quit smoking all at the same time.... very hard and I feel weak mentally at times. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: My mind my thoughts Bonita69 Bonita69

Posts.Content: Bonita69 wrote: well I have cancer....at 36 yrs old......... I have IDC stage1 boderline stage 2 in all 3 masses. Left breast. My Sister at age 34 also had breast cancer IDC Stage 0 as well as my 3 maternal Aunts.Same type as well but one had stage 3, All survived. I opted to do the DNA test to see if in fact we have the BRCA mutation in our family. For I have a 17 yr old daughter I hope and pray she NEVER HAS TO GO THROUGH THIS EVER!!!!!!!! Because of my strong family history I opted to do Mast. on both breast as well full hysterectomy. Same as my sister chose. My Dr. is still testing my biopsy to see what they are going to respond to and Chemo I'm not out of the woods on that yet. What kind of use will I have with my arms? How long? Plan is Simple total mastectomy First week in Feb 2009 if any cancer is found in nodes during surgery then Dr. said I will get modified radical mastectomy and chemo is 100% in my recovery plans. How is this going to affect my sex life will I be interested?? Chemo/hysterectomy Ya know after I heal and all? Since I don't know what menopause is like what is it like in that area? My man is so sexy and just could not imagine not being interested in him in that way....that bothers me a lot among other things all mushed up in my head right now.... Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Results "Scared....Biopsy today" Bonita69 FitChik

Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2009 09:06PM Bonita69 wrote: you guys are so cool!!!! Thanks a bunch and by the way my Dr. gave me Xanax on the same day I was DX so I guess she knew I would need them.LOL Doing good today I cleaned my house and it looks so clean and smells so fresh and that made me feel pretty good looking at my clean house... and it kept my mind clean TOO!!
